summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to Jeffrey Epstein discussing mutual fund managers. Staley, as the Chief Executive Officer of JPMorgan's Investment Bank, inquires about the size of a mutual fund that Epstein wants them to consider for someone named Tom.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the Chief Executive Officer of JPMorgan's Investment Bank and is reaching out to Jeffrey Epstein regarding mutual fund managers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email from Jes Staley, discussing mutual fund options.

connections.description: Jes Staley, as CEO of JPMorgan, is in a professional relationship with Jeffrey Epstein regarding financial services.

keyFacts: The email was sent on July 29, 2010.
Jes Staley is the Chief Executive Officer of JPMorgan's Investment Bank.
The email discusses mutual fund managers and inquiries about a specific size for a mutual fund.
Jeffrey Epstein is involved in the conversation regarding financial matters.
The email contains a confidential treatment request by JPMorgan Chase.
